# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_EXTRA_COLOUR_6

## Summary
Set a vehicles extra colour 6

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **INT** extraColour6

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Colour6 should be taken from the list in carcols.dat.
